content:
TITLE: Extended TradingView Signal Format in Bash DESCRIPTION: Shows an extended signal format with additional order details such as order type, volume, price, stop price, take profit price, and reduce only flag. SOURCE: https://github.com/drakkar-software/octobot-tentacles/blob/master/Trading/Mode/trading_view_signals_trading_mode/resources/TradingViewSignalsTradingMode.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ORDER_TYPE=LIMIT VOLUME=0.01 PRICE=42000 STOP_PRICE=25000 TAKE_PROFIT_PRICE=50000 REDUCE_ONLY=true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing HollaExCCXTAdapter class for OctoBot DESCRIPTION: This class extends RestExchange to provide HollaEx-specific functionality. It automatically fills exchange configuration with HollaEx details and implements the connection factory for proper integration with OctoBot's trading system. SOURCE: https://github.com/drakkar-software/octobot-tentacles/blob/master/Trading/Exchange/hollaex_autofilled/resources/hollaex_autofilled.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` import octobot_trading.exchanges.connectors.ccxt.ccxt_connector as ccxt_connector import octobot_trading.exchanges.rest_exchange as rest_exchange class HollaExCCXTAdapter(rest_exchange.RestExchange): @classmethod def get_name(cls): return 'hollaex' def get_adapter_class(self): return HollaExCCXT async def create_order(self, order_type, symbol, quantity, price=None, stop_price=None, side=None, current_price=None, reduce_only: bool = False, tag: str = None, params=None): params = params or {} return await super().create_order(order_type, symbol, quantity, price=price, stop_price=stop_price, side=side, current_price=current_price, reduce_only=reduce_only, tag=tag, params=params) class HollaExCCXT(ccxt_connector.CCXTConnector): # auto filled exchange EXCHANGE_ID = "hollaex" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic TradingView Signal Format in Bash DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the basic format for TradingView signals, including exchange, symbol, and signal type. SOURCE: https://github.com/drakkar-software/octobot-tentacles/blob/master/Trading/Mode/trading_view_signals_trading_mode/resources/TradingViewSignalsTradingMode.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` EXCHANGE=BINANCE SYMBOL=BTCUSD SIGNAL=BUY ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Order Cancellation Signal Format in Bash DESCRIPTION: Illustrates the format for cancelling orders, including exchange, symbol, and cancel signal. SOURCE: https://github.com/drakkar-software/octobot-tentacles/blob/master/Trading/Mode/trading_view_signals_trading_mode/resources/TradingViewSignalsTradingMode.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` EXCHANGE=binance SYMBOL=ETHBTC SIGNAL=CANCEL ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Exporting Local OctoBot Tentacles Changes DESCRIPTION: Command to export changes from local OctoBot tentacles folder into the OctoBot-Tentacles repository. It uses the start.py script with specific parameters to filter and copy the relevant tentacles. SOURCE: https://github.com/drakkar-software/octobot-tentacles/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` python start.py tentacles -e "../../OctoBot-Tentacles" OctoBot-Default-Tentacles -d "tentacles" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Embedding YouTube Video in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet embeds a YouTube video explaining how to build a Smart DCA strategy, likely related to the ChatGPT evaluator. It includes responsive iframe settings and a descriptive caption. SOURCE: https://github.com/drakkar-software/octobot-tentacles/blob/master/Evaluator/TA/ai_evaluator/resources/GPTEvaluator.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
Example of a trading strategy using ChatGPT and the ChatGPTEvaluator
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Embedding YouTube Video in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet embeds a YouTube video player into the documentation. It sets the video dimensions, source, and various attributes for player behavior and permissions. SOURCE: https://github.com/drakkar-software/octobot-tentacles/blob/master/Trading/Mode/daily_trading_mode/resources/DailyTradingMode.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Embedding YouTube Video for DCA Strategy in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet embeds a YouTube video explaining how to build a Smart DCA strategy. The video is centered on the page and has standard YouTube player controls. SOURCE: https://github.com/drakkar-software/octobot-tentacles/blob/master/Trading/Mode/dca_trading_mode/resources/DCATradingMode.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Web Crawler Access in robots.txt DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines rules for web crawlers, specifying that all user agents are disallowed from accessing any paths on the site. This configuration is typically used to prevent search engines and other bots from indexing or crawling certain parts of a website. SOURCE: https://github.com/drakkar-software/octobot-tentacles/blob/master/Services/Interfaces/web_interface/templates/robots.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: robotstxt CODE: ``` User-agent: * Disallow: / ```
